title.rendered: “IDF Operates in Jenin: Targeting Armed Terrorists After Shooting Attack”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces from the Samaria Brigade are conducting searches in the Jenin area following the shooting attack; hits were identified on several armed terrorists.

Following the initial report of gunfire in Har Bracha, a shooting attack was carried out from deep inside Jenin towards Mitzpe Yosef, which is under the Samaria Brigade’s jurisdiction. As a result of the gunfire, an Israeli civilian was injured, treated on-site, and evacuated for medical care. Numerous forces are currently searching for suspects.

During the forces’ search in the Jenin area, they fired at several armed terrorists during exchanges of gunfire, and hits were identified.

Attached is documentation of the forces’ activity in the Jenin area: https://bit.ly/4cOlc4Z

Attached is a soundbite from the sniper team commander in the 90th Battalion, Lieutenant N’: https://bit.ly/3xODLXG

Attached are images from the activity of the searching forces: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC0207202423545
